txt.en: Midnight, 39th Day of my Exile\n\nGalachán's spell is astonishing. If I understand correctly, this could have incredible potential. The genius behind it… is his madness making him capable of such leaps? No. I cannot believe that daft idiot came up with this on his own. He must be working with someone, and I must discover who. I have much to learn from such a master.
